mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.hotelid AS "hotelid", a.roomtypeid AS "roomtypeid", a.price AS "price", a.createtime AS "createtime", a.createuser AS "createuser", a.updatetime AS "updatetime", a.updateuser AS "updateuser", b.hotelname AS "hotelname", c.name AS "roomtypename"
